allegiances: House Lannister of Casterly Rock , House Lorch
name: Amory Lorch

aliases: The Maid of Tarth , Brienne the Beauty , Brienne the Blue
allegiances: House Baratheon of Storm's End , House Stark of Winterfell , House Tarth of Evenfall Hall
name: Brienne of Tarth

aliases: Catelyn Tully , Lady Stoneheart , The Silent Sistet , Mother Mercilesr , The Hangwomans
allegiances: House Stark of Winterfell , House Tully of Riverrun
name: Catelyn Stark
means_of_death: Throat slit by Black Walder Rivers at the Red Wedding
quotes:
[Robb receives news that Theon has betrayed him and seized Winterfell]

Robb Stark: This cannot be true.

Roose Bolton: We've had ravens from White Harbour, Barrowtown and the Dreadfort. I'm afraid it is true.

Robb Stark: Why? Why would Theon...?

Roose Bolton: Because the Greyjoys are treasonous whores.

Robb Stark: My brothers...

Roose Bolton: We've heard nothing of them... but Rodrik Cassel is dead.

Catelyn Stark: [angrily] I told you never trust a Greyjoy!

Robb Stark: I must go north at once.

[Robb stands and starts to walk out of the tent. Roose Bolton approaches him]

Roose Bolton: There's still a war to win, Your Grace!

Robb Stark: [angrily] How can I call myself 'King' if I can't hold my own castle? How can I ask men to follow me if...?

Roose Bolton: [firmly] You are a king! And that means you don't have to do everything yourself.

Catelyn Stark: Let me go and talk to Theon.

Robb Stark: There will be no talk. He will die for this!

Roose Bolton: Theon holds the castle with a skeleton crew. Let me send word to my bastard at the Dreadfort; he can raise a few hundred men and retake Winterfell before the new moon. We have the Lannisters on the run; if you march all the way back north now, you'll lose what you gained. My boy would be honoured to bring you Prince Theon's head.

Robb Stark: Tell your son Bran and Rickon's safety is paramount. And Theon... I want him brought to me alive. I want to look him in the eye and ask him 'Why?'... and then I will take his head myself!

name: Cersei Lannister
seasons: Season 1 , Season 2 , Season 3 , Season 4 , Season 5 , Season 6
titles: Light of the West , Queen Dowager , Protector of the Realm , Lady of Casterly Rock , Queen Regent
quotes: Cersei Lannister: [to Tyrion, as Myrcella is sent away in a boat] One day I pray you love someone. I pray you love her so much, when you close your eyes, you see her face. I want that for you. I want you to know what it's like to love someone, truly love someone, before I take her from you.

aliases: Dany , Daenerys Stormborn , The Unburnt , Mother of Dragons , Mother , Mhysa , The Silver Queen , Silver Lady , Dragonmother , The Dragon Queen , The Mad King's daughter
name: Daenerys Targaryen
seasons: Season 1 , Season 2 , Season 3 , Season 4 , Season 5 , Season 6
titles: Queen of the Andals and the Rhoynar and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms , Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea , Breaker of Shackles/Chains , Queen of Meereen , Princess of Dragonstone
quotes: Daenerys Targaryen: Where are they? Where are my dragons?

name: High Septon
titles: High Septon , His High Holiness , Father of the Faithful , Voice of the Seven on Earth

name: Irri
means_of_death: Murdered during Xaro Xhoan Daxos’ theft of the dragons at Qarth

aliases: Joffrey the Illborn , The Young Usurper , Aerys the Third , Joffrey-called-Baratheon
name: Joffrey Baratheon
titles: King of the Andals, the Rhoynar and the First Men , Lord of the Seven Kingdoms , Protector of the Realm
means_of_death: Poisoned at the Purple Wedding by Olenna Tyrell and Littlefinger
quotes:
[during the riot]

Joffrey Baratheon: Traitors! I'll have their heads!

Tyrion Lannister: Oh you blind, bloody fool!

Joffrey Baratheon: You can't insult me!

Tyrion Lannister: We've had vicious kings, and we've had idiot kings, but I don't think we've ever been cursed with a vicious idiot for a king!

Joffrey Baratheon: You can't!

Tyrion Lannister: I can, I am!

Joffrey Baratheon: They attacked me!

Tyrion Lannister: The threw a cow pie at you so you decide to kill them all? They're starving, you fool! All because of a war you started!

Joffrey Baratheon: YOU'RE TALKING TO A KING!

[Tyrion slaps Joffrey in the face]

Tyrion Lannister: And now I've struck a king! Did my hand fall from my wrist? Where is the Stark girl?

Joffrey Baratheon: Let them have her!

Tyrion Lannister: If she dies, you'll never get your Uncle Jaime back! You owe him quite a bit, you know!

[the Hound protects Joffrey from the angry mob, leading him safety]

Joffrey Baratheon: What are you doing? I want these people executed!

Sandor 'The Hound' Clegane: And they want the same for you!

aliases: Lord Snow , Ned Stark's Bastard , The Snow of Winterfell , The Crow-Come-Over , The 998th Lord Commander of the Night's Watch , The Bastard of Winterfell , The Black Bastard of the Wall , Lord Crow
name: Jon Snow
seasons: Season 1 , Season 2 , Season 3 , Season 4 , Season 5 , Season 6
titles: Lord Commander of the Night's Watch
means_of_death: Stabbed by Night’s Watch mutineers, including Alliser Thorne and Olly

name: Meryn Trant
means_of_death: Blinded and stabbed before having his throat slit by Arya Stark

name: Myrcella Baratheon
means_of_death: Poisoned with a kiss by Ellaria Sand with the help of the Sand Snakes

name: Osha
means_of_death: Stabbed in the neck by Ramsay Bolton

allegiances: House Baelish of Harrenhal , House Baelish of the Fingers
name: Petyr "Littlefinger" Baelish
seasons: Season 1 , Season 2 , Season 3 , Season 4 , Season 5 , Season 6
titles: Master of coin (formerly) , Lord Paramount of the Trident , Lord of Harrenhal , Lord Protector of the Vale
means_of_death: Throat slit by Arya Stark on the order of Sansa Stark

name: Qhorin
means_of_death: Killed by Jon Snow (at Qhorin’s own behest) in order to trick the Wildlings into thinking Jon has left the Night’s Watch

name: Rickon Stark
titles: Prince of Winterfell , Heir to Winterfell
means_of_death: Shot with an arrow in the back by Ramsay Bolton

aliases: The Young Wolf , The King Who Lost the North , Robb the Lord , The Boy Wolf
name: Robb Stark
titles:
King in the North , King of the Trident
